description: New Trent Arcadia ACD300 - Arclight iPad Mini Keyboard CaseNew Trent Arcadia Arclight Mini Bluetooth iPad mini keyboard case is designed exclusively for the new Apple iPad mini. This sleek and portable wireless keyboard case will allow you to wirelessly connect to your iPad mini and type with ease and comfort. With an adjustable arm piece, you may also alternate between vertical and horizontal orientations to achieve the perfect viewing angle.Specs- Designed specifically for the 7.9 inch Apple iPad mini-  Wireless Bluetooth keyboard with integrated iOS shortkeys- Polycarbonate exterior and metal hingeBe sure to find the logo on both product and package to ensure 10 months product warranty
title: Arcadia ArcLight - Wireless Bluetooth iPad Mini Keyboard Case for the Apple iPad Mini. Aluminum Stand with Multi Angle Viewing and Orientation.
